context: Analyze this standing balance pose and identify comprehensive transition relationships. Warrior III (Virabhadrasana III) Standing balance with lifted leg parallel to ground. Consider the Balance, single-leg strength, core stability, focus. Analyze transitions that flow naturally from this pose and evaluate both immediate possibilities and progressive developments. Factor in modifications for different ability levels and the pose's role in creating balanced sequences.

practitioner.position: Standing balance with lifted leg parallel to ground
practitioner.primaryFocus: Balance, single-leg strength, core stability, focus

specificNeeds: Balance, single-leg strength, core stability, focus
practitionerProfile.practiceStyle: All styles, especially Hatha and therapeutic
